generalInformation.category-description: Select the event label you want to create
generalInformation.description-description: Write a short, clear description of the event you want to create
generalInformation.h2:
Please provide general information about the event you would like to create. 
You can specify whether the event is public or private and whether it is published or not. 
You can also select the event classification, specify the location of the event, and specify the start and end date of the event and the start and end date of the recording.
generalInformation.name-description: Choose a unique and attention-grabbing name for your event
generalInformation.title: General information

uploadCover.h2:
Please upload a cover photo to increase the appeal of your content and attract the attention of your target audience. 
An attractive cover image can be an important element in attracting attention and enhancing user engagement with your content. 
We recommend uploading an attractive and inspiring image that reflects the essence of the content and attracts immediate attention.
uploadCover.title: Upload cover image
